article_title: Mediaite’s Top 10 Most-Shared Cable News Moments of 2013
article_text:
‘Tis the season for “giving” — i.e., sharing Mediaite articles with your friends and family on various social media sites.

As 2013 comes to a close, let’s look back on the top 10 cable news moments which inspired you all to be very generous with your “giving.”

From Jon Stewart repeatedly demolishing cable news hosts to Nancy Grace cursing on-air to a conservative radio host telling his female liberal opponent to “shut up and know your place,” it’s been a long year of cable news buffoonery, awkwardness, sadness, and occasional gloriousness.

According to our analytics, these are the 10 most-shared cable news moments of the year:

— —

>> Follow Andrew Kirell (@AndrewKirell) on Twitter
